ingredients.item: ½ x 500g pack frozen Cooks’ Ingredients Butternut Vine Squash
240g pack cod fillets, cut into bitesized chunks

instructions.step: Place a large saucepan or casserole dish over a medium heat. Add the curry paste and lime leaves. Sizzle for 30 seconds before adding the coconut milk, milk and stock. Bring to a simmer then add the butternut squash and sugar and cook for 15 minutes.
Add the fish and spinach and continue to cook gently for 4-5 minutes, until the cod is opaque and just cooked through.
Cook the rice according to the pack instructions. Stir in the lime juice and rice. Season. Ladle into bowls to serve.
